POtHS
Pouring Out the Holy Spiritruth

POtHS - Holy Treasures - 47 - Advanced Ancient Civilizations and Pyramids





POtHS Says: December 25 was the day that the Wise Men, brought Jesus gifts when he was 15 months old, NOT THE DAY HE AS BORN.

Description

Ancient Giants who ruled America:
Red Ice Radio interview with guest and author Richard J. Dewhurst about his book:  The Ancient Giants Who Ruled America - The Missing Skeletons and the Great Smithsonian cover-up.

A study of the substantial evidence for a former race of giants in North America and its 150-year suppression by the Smithsonian Institution Shows how thousands of giant skeletons have been found, particularly in the Mississippi Valley, as well as the ruins of the giants' cities Explores 400 years of giant finds, including newspaper articles, first person accounts, state historical records, and illustrated field reports Reveals the Stonehenge-era megalithic burial complex on Catalina Island with over 4,000 giant skeletons, including kings more than 9 feet tall Includes more than 100 rare photographs and illustrations of the lost evidence Drawing on 400 years of newspaper articles and photos, first person accounts, state historical records, and illustrated field reports.



ANCIENT MAN MADE TUNNELS - Underground Civilizations:
History Channel's Ancient Man Made Tunnels - Underground Civilizations (full documentary episode). Who and why were they made? Many questions remain unanswered after viewing the pieces to this puzzle. thanks for watching.
------------------------------------------------------------------------

Giants Revealing the Agenda, Parts One & Two:
Gary and L.A. continue their discussion about the nephilim. This time focusing on the structures that may have been built by giants.  Also examined are various archeological discoveries of the past that have been hidden from public view, like an UNBORN nephilim fetus still in mother's womb that has both an elongated skull and fully formed teeth. Or giants 12-13 feet tall removed from museum displays around the world.  How were the Nazi's involved?  Why the coverup and what's their agenda? <a href="
http://www.prophecyinthenews.com" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.prophecyinthenews.com</a>
------------------------------------------------------------------------

Mysterious Stone Chambers & Giants Discovered in New England:
Strange stone tunnels and chambers, perhaps pre-historic, have been found in Leyden, Wendell, Pelham, Montague, New Salem, Whitingham, VT and throughout New England. Who built these structures and when? Why?

Ashfield stonemason Jim Vieira has been exploring local stone chambers for years as a member of the Northeast Antiquities Research Association, which has studied these structures for 60 years. He describes the stone ceremonial landscape of New England, carbon-dating evidence and historical texts.  His slides document local sites and others in New England, and he discusses what they represent and who may have built them.
------------------------------------------------------------------------

Recent Discoveries of Advanced Ancient Civilizations:
Laboratory of Alternative History - Results of the LAH Expeditions from 2004-2011 (with Subtitles) by Andrey Sklyarov.


Russian to English translation, subtitles(Closed Captions), and voice narration
by Kon K.

** Correction at 5:39 : Pepi II (2284 BC - 2184 BC) was a pharaoh of the Sixth dynasty in Egypt's Old Kingdom. Therefore the phrase should be "Dating back to the 2nd millennium BC or 4290 years ago" instead of "5500 years ago." Thanks to one of the commenters at unexplained-mysteries.com for pointing out the error.

Depending on how this video is received, I may translate some of their other videos and lectures including a whole series on Peru and Bolivia as well as Egypt.

The author of this translation is not affiliated in any way with Laboratory of Alternative History.

Download video and subtitles (MP4 and SRT format):
------------------------------------------------------------------------

Mystery of the Sphinx:
The Mystery of the Sphinx, introduced American viewers to the discovery by John Anthony West and Robert Schoch that the Great Sphinx of Giza might be thousands of years older than its assumed date of 2500 BC. Narrated by Charlton Heston, the documentary provides evidence that the ancient Egyptians possessed scientific knowledge unknown to us and carried on the wisdom tradition of an earlier lost civilization.
------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Lost Caves of Giza:
From UFOTVÃ‚Â®, accept no imitations. Beneath the pyramids of Egypt lies a lost underworld of catacombs, hewn chambers and cave tunnels that have remained unexplored for hundreds of years. They are alluded to in ancient texts and Arab legends, but have been left unexplored until today. They have now been rediscovered and investigated for the first time. What exactly does this subterranean realm tell us about the pyramids, their relationship to the stars and the mythical origins of Egyptian civilization? Discover for yourself as we explore the "Lost Caves of Giza."
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

The Valley Of The Bosnian Pyramids, plus udate on recent findings:
The recent discovery of Bosnian Pyramid is an archaeological project exploring and excavating the largest pyramid in the World and the surrounding ancient complex of pyramids.  The Bosnian Valley of the Pyramids complex covers some 40km2 in area, encompassing 6 main structures and the subterranean Ravne Tunnel complex. It is situated 30 km North of the capital city Sarajevo, Bosnia Herzegovina, in the town of Visoko.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Also included is a folder on Lost Civilization short videos.  Very interesting, indeed.
